hackathon-description-text: HackUTA is The University of Texas at Arlington's first ever 24-hour hackathon, hosted by UTA students. It will take place in University Center on the weekend of September 30th and October 1st. All skill levels are welcome, so come learn, collaborate, hack, and have fun!
hackathon-rules: Just do the thing your parents always told you to do. Treat others as you want to be treated.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Design a creative solution for helping people recover from a disaster.

Allstate prides itself on keeping its customers in good hands. Design a solution that can help make every day life, feel a little better. Whether big or small, your submission should have a positive impact on the user's lifestyle.
Match is an industry leader for connecting people together and building relationships all over the world. Their +1 labs in Dallas needs your help to solve one of their everyday challenges.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best app that connects people together

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The top project that has the potential to become a startup will have a chance to work with TechFW to develop a business plan and run through their accelerator program for free! You will also receive tickets to their big event coming up in October.
Best application with Computer Vision wins a drone.
Best application of Computer Vision with Machine Learning.
Best use of AWS in your project! Examples include EC2, S3, EB, etc. They have a ton of great tutorials!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Coolest, witties, funniest best .com domain name.
Best IOT hack using an 410C Dragonboard.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Feature your cool hackathon project on your free .tech domain name. Make sure to make your full .tech domain your official team name and mention the URL while submitting it on Devpost!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=300 W 1st St, Arlington, TX 76010, USA
